Регулярные выражения

-Sequence of characters which help us to identify textual material of given pattern

2 Kinds of characters literals (обычные символы) and metacharacters (метасимволы):

  1. Literals - represent defined char
  2. Metacharacters - Example : (Del *.*) Where ».» - is literal, 2 «*» (asterisk) is metachars.
